restaurants.name: Rose's Luxury
restaurants.accolades: Michelin ⭐ (2021-2025) | Bon Appétit #1 Best New Restaurant 2014 | Esquire Best New 2014 | Tom Sietsema Favorite
restaurants.notes: aaron silverman is a genius; this is THE occasion restaurant to also get good food

restaurants.name: Inn at Little Washington
restaurants.accolades: Michelin ⭐⭐⭐ (2018-2025, ONLY 3-star in DMV) | JBF Outstanding Restaurant
restaurants.notes: pear dessert, linzer tarts YUM

restaurants.name: Causa
restaurants.accolades: Michelin ⭐ (2024-2025) | Washingtonian #1 2024 | JBF Best Chef Mid-Atlantic 2024 (Carlos Delgado) | RAMMY Chef of Year 2024
restaurants.notes: so performative but in the best way - order off the fish market

restaurants.name: Albi
restaurants.accolades: Michelin ⭐ (2022-2025) | JBF Outstanding Chef 2024 (Michael Rafidi) | Eater DC Restaurant of Year 2021 | Bon Appétit Best New 2020 | Esquire Best New 2020
restaurants.notes: Good, interesting, one time is enough

restaurants.name: Oyster Oyster
restaurants.accolades: Michelin ⭐ + Green Star (2022-2025) | JBF Outstanding Chef 2023 (Rob Rubba)
restaurants.notes: Dream restaurant, just elevated in every way, most interesting in all of DC

restaurants.name: Pineapple & Pearls
restaurants.accolades: Michelin ⭐ (2025, down from ⭐⭐) | JBF Outstanding Restaurant Semifinalist
restaurants.notes: Service absolutely phenomenal, decor feels a bit cheap for the cost but great food

restaurants.name: Maydan
restaurants.accolades: Previously Michelin ⭐ (2021-2023) | Tom Sietsema Top 40 2024 | Eater Essential
restaurants.notes: bang for your buck tbh on the fixed menu, amazing atmosphere, sad it lost its star, great mezze
restaurants.vibe: Special occasion, group dining, hearth drama

restaurants.name: Anju
restaurants.accolades: Washingtonian #1 2020 | WaPo 3-star | 4x JBF Semifinalist | RAMMY Chef of Year 2024 (Angel Barreto) | Michelin Guide
restaurants.notes: YES TO BIBIMBAP - divine

restaurants.name: Moon Rabbit
restaurants.accolades: JBF Outstanding Pastry Chef Finalist 2024 (Susan Bae) | JBF Best Chef Finalist 2024 (Kevin Tien)
restaurants.notes: JENN'S FAVORITE - really undervalued, art plating, a gem of a restaurant, so cozy and PRETTY, dessert is most interesting in all of dc I think,  location sucks (11th & F) but feels nice without being stuffy

restaurants.name: The Dabney
restaurants.accolades: Michelin ⭐ (2021-2025) | JBF Best Chef Mid-Atlantic Semifinalist (Jeremiah Langhorne)

restaurants.name: Rooster & Owl
restaurants.accolades: Michelin ⭐ (2021-2025) | Washingtonian Top 100 | Tom Sietsema Favorite
restaurants.notes: treated v well on birthday, fun describing dishes; Service absolutely phenomenal, decor feels a bit cheap for the cost but great food

restaurants.name: Tail Up Goat
restaurants.accolades: Michelin ⭐ (2021-2025) | JBF Outstanding Service 2024 | Washingtonian Top 100
restaurants.notes: all I remember is ordering more bread bc portions were small and it was like burnt burnt; closing

restaurants.name: Sushi Nakazawa
restaurants.accolades: Michelin ⭐ (2023-2025) | FAV - Starred in NYC too
restaurants.notes: divine.

restaurants.notes: Regional Spanish by Chef Danny Lledó

restaurants.name: El Cielo
restaurants.notes: GREAT VIBES, felt where she lands on price

restaurants.name: Kinship
restaurants.notes: ELEGANT but formal contemporary (Jenn's least favorite style) - foie gras ew gross

restaurants.notes: foie gras ew gross

restaurants.name: Rania
restaurants.notes: really really awesome elevated indian

restaurants.name: Little Pearl
restaurants.notes: Love the service, elevated atmosphere, disappoints on some execution but EXCELLENT food aesthetics; so underwhelmed and disappointed but ambiance is killer - throw away fancy date

restaurants.name: Perry's
restaurants.accolades: JBF Emerging Chef 2024 (Masako Morishita) | RAMMY Rising Star 2024 | Tom Sietsema Favorite | Casually goodn not breaking the bank

restaurants.name: Lapis
restaurants.notes: JENN'S FAVORITE - warm intimate with stunning rugs & heirloom photos, feels like coming into their home; DUMPLINGS AND BURANEE KADOO AND LENTILS - hard to come by a  person who has been to an afghani restaurant

restaurants.name: Rasika
restaurants.accolades: JBF winner (Vikram Sunderam) | Tom Sietsema Hall of Fame | Knightsbridge Group
restaurants.notes: overpriced indian

restaurants.name: Pascual

restaurants.notes: JENN'S FAVORITE - GOOD OCTOPUS UNHEARD OF, superb wine, great for date, 11/10

restaurants.name: Amparo Fondita
restaurants.accolades: Michelin Bib (2024 NEW) | Tom Sietsema Favorite

restaurants.notes: Gorgeous, would go back for dessert

restaurants.notes: V GOOD - unexplored territory Columbia Heights, great food, parents pleaser

restaurants.name: La Bonne Vache
restaurants.notes: hear it’s a RLY good burger

restaurants.name: Yellow
restaurants.notes: georgetown location is uncomfortably packed but I crave their pitas, love the interesting pastries, always a vibe

restaurants.name: Boulangerie Christophe
restaurants.notes: idk how to describe this other than its VERY "OUI OUI"

restaurants.name: Bagels Etc
restaurants.notes: two words. Egg bagels.

restaurants.name: Le Tomate
restaurants.notes: its so cute but never been bc I hear the food is just okay italian and jenny hates italian generally

restaurants.name: Zorba's
restaurants.notes: if you want to feel like your greek grandmother made you dinner

restaurants.name: Daily Provisions
restaurants.notes: replaced foxtrot rip - running a similar scam of dainty/trendy font, oferring the basic favs of the girlies

restaurants.name: Rakuya
restaurants.notes: I like the bento boxes for lunch that’s it

restaurants.name: Pisco y Nazca
restaurants.notes: solid bar, eligible for HH, ceviche!!

restaurants.name: Chiko
restaurants.notes: I find it it heavy but if I remove my skinny bitch filter, its pretty awesome chinese

restaurants.name: Kramers
restaurants.notes: carrot cake, why would you eat a full meal here idk

restaurants.name: Taim
restaurants.notes: way too small portions but the mezze options are right son

restaurants.name: Succotash
restaurants.notes: solid HH place, waste of a façade but great deviled eggs goddamn

restaurants.name: Rice Bar
restaurants.notes: jenny's dream lunch spot, korean/clean girl cava

restaurants.name: 54 Restaurant
restaurants.notes: solid pho place downtown

restaurants.name: Oh Mama Grill
restaurants.notes: why tf are you closed on fridays and saturdays I know it’s a jewish thing but cmon.generous portions, sweet dudes on the kitchen staff, careful not to get too many pickled toppings

restaurants.name: The Diner
restaurants.notes: u need to end up here at least once in your 20s and experience the shitty but also be saved by the toast when ur down bad at 2 am

restaurants.name: Filomena
restaurants.notes: ppl like this and idgi. The plates are massive and grossed me out. I understand they are doing americana but I get anxious with how much stuff is on the walls

restaurants.name: Dirty Habit
restaurants.notes: decent HH place, prime location, outdoor setups

restaurants.name: Tabard Inn
restaurants.notes: cute, feels a little haunted, for a dinner with a grandpa or somethn

restaurants.name: Iron Gate
restaurants.notes: superrrrr romantic and cute I could throw up, I imagine a ritzy couple going out here just bc

restaurants.name: Elfegne
restaurants.notes: used to be zenebechs the name change was weird, they have a tilapia dish tha tmost other ethiopian places don’t so jenny likes (protein gains)

restaurants.name: Heat da Spot
restaurants.notes: you would never expect to be blown away but boy does this place do that. Phenom eggs. Just go. If ur party is afraid of georgia ave they are racist but also not super wrong

restaurants.name: The Coupe
restaurants.notes: neighborhood spot, nothing special but it maintains a senior institutional status in columbia heights

restaurants.name: Timber Pizza
restaurants.notes: why oh why did they stop making za'taar pizza. Sigh. Dough is great. DO NOT SKIP THE EMPANADAS

restaurants.name: Purple Patch
restaurants.notes: not at all good for pescatarian/non-meat eater diet; only filipino place I know; good brunch options

restaurants.name: Mount Desert
restaurants.notes: rly disgustingly cute ice cream shop, gives you a reason to go to mt pleasant which is underrated

restaurants.name: Bar Charley
restaurants.notes: convenient location, you could miss it bc its basement level sort of - good moody vibe - for a low effort hangout

restaurants.name: un je ne sais quo
restaurants.notes: v authentic french high patisserie

restaurants.name: ambar
restaurants.notes: BOTTOMLESS FOOD WUT

restaurants.name: lutece
restaurants.notes: ppl with kind of bougie taste wont shut up about it

restaurants.name: yala
restaurants.notes: really cute ice cream place in georgetown with FROYO OPTIONS… that are GOOD

restaurants.name: Le Diplomate
restaurants.accolades: DC institution | Tom Sietsema Hall of Fame
restaurants.notes: THE french bistro of DC, always a scene, steak frites are iconic, great for brunch too

restaurants.name: Reynolds
restaurants.notes: phenomenal cocktails, intimate speakeasy vibe, same team as Casamara

restaurants.name: Death and Co
restaurants.notes: legendary cocktail bar from NYC, moody vibes, expertly crafted drinks

restaurants.name: Cana
restaurants.notes: rum-focused bar with Caribbean vibes, great atmosphere

restaurants.name: Maison Bar  Vins
restaurants.notes: French wine bar with excellent selection and cozy vibe

restaurants.name: Bar Betsie
restaurants.notes: stylish cocktail bar with excellent drinks

restaurants.name: Silver Lyan
restaurants.notes: inventive cocktails from the Mr Lyan team, hotel bar vibes

restaurants.name: Residents Cafe and Bar
restaurants.notes: great neighborhood cafe and bar
